question: Which type of climate does Évora, Portugal, have according to the Köppen-Geiger classification?
asked_question_translated: 根据 Köppen-Geiger 分类法，葡萄牙埃武拉属于哪种气候类型？
answer: 根据 Köppen-Geiger 分类法，葡萄牙埃武拉属于地中海气候（Csa）。
answer_translated_eng: According to the Köppen-Geiger classification, Evora, Portugal has a Mediterranean climate (Csa).
